author: Nintendo of America
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition is out now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-splintered-fate-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

Kick shell with the Turtles, now in 4K and 60fps! Co-op is also better than ever with GameChat and GameShare, connecting you to your friends in the same room or online. For existing owners of the Nintendo Switch version, check your devices for more information on an upgrade pack to gain access to the all the features and upgrades on Nintendo Switch 2. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #TeenageMutantNinjaTurtles 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Twitch: https://w
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
The free FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE demo is out now on Nintendo Switch 2! Play the demo and pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/final-fantasy-vii-remake-intergrade-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Play the free demo today, featuring the first iconic chapter—the Mako Reactor 1 bombing mission. Carry over your save data to the main game when it launches on Jan 22, 2026. In addition, if save data has been created for the demo, the bonus items “Revival Earrings” and “Survival Set” can be claimed in the full game. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #FFVII 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE – One-Winged Angel Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
